item.title: Javascript Function Name logging
Getting Started in Javascript
item.description: Getting started with javascript in chrome Inline javascript is faster than loading external files but external files are easier to update if in larger projects or the same code is used in many html files. Basic inline javascript in a html file <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>Getting started with Javascript</title> </head> <body> <h1 id="header">Intro to Javascript</h1> <!-- Javascript goes in the script tags --> <script> var header = document.
